means: 疲惫不堪的，操劳过度的
使（人或人的身体）非常虚弱( debilitate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Occasionally a patient is so debilitated that he must be fed intravenously.
sentence.Network_cn: 偶尔会有病人过于虚弱，必须通过静脉注射进食。

sentence.Network_en: Stewart took over yesterday when Russell was debilitated by a stomach virus.
sentence.Network_cn: 昨天拉塞尔因肠胃病毒感染身体不适，由斯图尔特暂时接手。

sentence.Network_en: Prolonged strike action debilitated the industry.
sentence.Network_cn: 长时间的罢工削弱了这个行业的活力。

PerfectNetExp.abs: debilitate 使衰弱debilitated 虚弱debility 衰弱
她那本已虚弱的身体由于劳累过度和抽烟而变得更弱了.  来自互联网  5. He was debilitated by excesses.  他因生活不知节制而衰弱.  来自互联网  6. She.

list.abs: 其它研究则表明 [8 ] , 焦虑对学习主要是起阻碍作用, 这类焦虑被称为阻碍性焦虑 ( debilitating anxiety) 。为此, 学者们对焦虑的.
一种是退缩性焦虑 （debilitating anxiety）。它使学习者逃避学习任务。
神草 ginseng神衰 debilitated spirit神堂 BL-44\w
偏食异物 perverted appetite偏衰 abnormally debilitated偏衰 abnormally weak
庞培氏病是一种罕见但严重的衰竭性疾病（debilitating disease），急剧降低了人的肌肉及呼吸功能，该病在每4万到30万人中影响1人。

entry.def: If you are debilitated by something such as an illness, it causes your body or mind to become gradually weaker.

example.ex: Stewart took over yesterday when Russell was debilitated by a stomach virus.
example.tran: 昨天拉塞尔因肠胃病毒感染身体不适，由斯图尔特暂时接手。

entry.tran: 削弱（组织、社团或政府）的力量
entry.def: To debilitate an organization, society, or government means to gradually make it weaker.

example.ex: ...their efforts to debilitate the political will of the Western alliance.
example.tran: 他们试图削弱西方联盟的政治决心的努力

auth_sentence.content: He was frequently debilitated by heavy nosebleeds.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was frequently debilitated by heavy nosebleeds.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was frequently debilitated by heavy nosebleeds.

auth_sentence.content: He won't die immediately, but he will progressively lose his faculties and become ever more debilitated until he dies.
auth_sentence.res_content: He won't die immediately, but he will progressively lose his faculties and become ever more debilitated until he dies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He won't die immediately, but he will progressively lose his faculties and become ever more debilitated until he dies.

auth_sentence.content: It is a disease that renders its patients totally debilitated and often confined to bed.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is a disease that renders its patients totally debilitated and often confined to bed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is a disease that renders its patients totally debilitated and often confined to bed.
